title: Battery Management IC Engineer
summary: In this highly visible role, you will support the development of Battery Management ICs for Apple’s products.
description: You will be part of a small team responsible for the silicon part of Apple’s Battery Management systems. In this role you will join the battery team to assemble the requirements for Battery Management ICs and translate those to circuit level specifications.
key_qualifications:
Proven experience in Battery Management architecture design and circuit development
Experience with the specification and design of ADCs for Li_Ion parametric measurement, coulomb counting and other key parameters of a Battery Management system
Solid understanding of high resolution/accuracy ADC design and architecture technologies specifically of 1st/2nd order ∆∑ ADC and SAR architectures
Familiarity with post processing ADC filters
In depth understanding of performance improvement techniques such as dither, chopping and dynamic element matching
Deep understanding of circuit building blocks such as bandgaps, LDO’s, bias networks and clock oscillators
Knowledge of Li-Ion Battery safety requirements
Experience with MATLAB/Simulink and Python or C programming
Hands-on lab experience is a plus
Strong initiative and ownership of responsibilities, productive, able to meet bold deadlines
Good written and verbal interpersonal skills
education_experience:
BSEE required plus 10+ years of relevant experience or equivalent
